_meanings:
{@--1@} To remove, take
away, destroy (said to be <ab>Atm.</ab>
only except where it has ‘a part of
the body’ for its object);  
{#pawupawahaDvaniBirvinItanidraH#} <ls>R. 9. 71</ls>; {#vinItaKedaH#}
<ls n="R.">13. 35</ls>, <ls n="R. 13.">46</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 48</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 62</ls>,  
<ls>Ki. 7. 30</ls>, <ls>Ku. 1. 9</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">5. 32.</ls>

{@--2@} To teach,
instruct, educate, train; {#vininyurenaM#}
{#guravo gurupriyaM#} <ls>R. 3. 29</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 101.</ls>  
<ls n="R.">15. 69</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 51</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 311</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 34.</ls>

{@--6@} To
carry through, perform, complete,
finish.

{@--7@} To spend, apply to use
(<ab>Atm.</ab>). {#SataM vinayate#} <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--8@} To give,
present, pay, pay off (as tribute)
(<ab>Atm.</ab>); {#karaM vinayate#} <ls>Sk.</ls>
